conversion_verification.notes: A genuine 3D cutaway model has been generated following the floor plan layout.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall height, thickness, and appropriate isometric-style projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is generally high, though there is some slight condensation of the long corridor and the kitchen utility area geometry is simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture sets (beds, dining, couch) are present and correctly placed, though minor balcony furniture is missing.

visual_clarity.notes: Structures are clear but score is reduced due to text label contamination directly on the 3D floor plane.

detected_errors.description: Floating text labels (BEDROOM-1, KITCHEN) are baked into the 3D render space.
Window placements on the bottom exterior wall are slightly offset compared to the 2D source.

summary: A high-quality 3D conversion that accurately translates the architectural layout into a 3D cutaway, despite minor text label contamination.
